data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Kurixalus from Yunnan, China (Anura, Rhacophoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yu, Guohua, Wang, Jishan, Hou, Mian, Rao, Dingqi, Yang, Junxing (2017): A new species of the genus Kurixalus from Yunnan, China (Anura, Rhacophoridae). ZooKeys 694: 71-93, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.694.12785, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.694.12785
